version_description: Fixed iOS 6 & iOS 7 crashing with playback screen context menu

* Added playback order controls, shuffle and repeat modes
* Made the next track visible to the skin
* Grid album view is now text+image by default, image-only is opt-in
* Made duplicate tracks hidden by default when browsing
* Various utility

* Added stop after current feature
* Repeat / shuffle / stop after current are now accessible via skin elements; default skin provides shuffle/repeat controls
* Smarter shuffle vs non-repeat behavior when manually started playback from specific trac

* Corrected a greatly annoying regression from the previous version - pausing iTunes library tracks while the device is locked and not on AC power, playback would advance to the next track a few seconds from unpausing
* Made all now-playing album artwo
Corrected previous version regression causing missing album covers in playback sceren

* Fixed iOS 10 first run experience, now indexes the media library as soon as you approve the prompt
* Decoder codebase updates from desktop foobar2000
* iOS versions older than 8 no longer supported, as new Xcode doesn't support those. However you
Playlist manipulation features
2016-10-06 hotfix - fixed last minute 1.0.39 edit gone wrong. Playlists work as intended now ;)

Fixed many many playlist manipulation bugs
Added “create playlist” commands
Made possible to add items to playlist from “Play location”
Updated WavPack library, now possible to play WavPack 5 DSD files
Tapping blank seekbar on nonseekable file
Fixed regression with Media Library indexing getting stuck on iOS 9.3.x since the iOS 10 fix

Added website / forum / support links to the about page
Fixed mono AAC files not playing
Fixed high sample rate ALAC files not playing
Fixed certain MP3 files (ones not gapless to begin with) having extra silence inserted at the end
Fixed user

Fixed bugs related to handling of files with : characters in names
Fixed artist pictures not being picked from compilation albums
Fixed UPnP incompatibility with MinimServer

FTP server: now available to everyone, not just beta users.
FTP server: improved compatibility with various FTP clients.
Tools menu structure cleanups.
Skinning: New image entries: iconadd, iconremove, iconsliders, iconspeaker, iconmenu, iconlist

version_name: 1.0.61 release notesFFmpeg now used for AAC + MP3New supported formats: TAK [FFmpeg]

version_description: Fixed AAC & ALAC decoding regressions - mono and high-sample-rate files play again.

version_name: 1.0.67 release notesFixed missing metadata when making playlists with tracks not indexed by the Media Library.Fixed stall when trying to back out of loading a large list of UPnP items.Improved UPnP compatibility with servers giving wrong content-type for

version_description:
Version 1.0.61 release notes

FFmpeg now used for AAC + MP3
New supported formats: TAK [FFmpeg], APE [FFmpeg], WMA [FFmpeg]
Greatly improved FTP browsing performance over 1.0.60
More reliable remembering of scroll position across various vi

Version 1.0.67 release notes

Fixed missing metadata when making playlists with tracks not indexed by the Media Library.
Fixed stall when trying to back out of loading a large list of UPnP items.
Improved UPnP compatibility with servers giving

Version 1.0.79 release notes

Folder browsing tweaks, non audio files (if enabled) shown in a separate group.
Track number field handling fixes.
Fixed "style" metadata field not being read (need to reindex library to take effect).
UPnP comp
Maintenance & bug fix update. See forum for full change list.

Removed lite version restrictions, public version now has all features enabled.
Crash bug fixes.
Improved app responsivity in case of stuck decoder.

Bug fixes.
Corrected missing internet radio titles.

Bug fix update.
Fixed rare media library CPU usage issues.
Fixed glitches when reordering playlist items.

foobar2000 mobile 1.1 series finally available for all users.

Major changes include:
Swipe between browse/playback screens now works the same way as on other platforms.
Greatly improved FTP share support; Media Library can index FTP network s

Fixed Media Library regressions from the previous release.
FTP compatibility improvements.

Initial support for syncing with TuneFUSION.
Bug fixes.
Fixed 1.1.18 regression causing crashes on 32-bit devices.

Fixed iOS 13 lock screen integration bugs.
Worked around AirDrop creating encrypted files that cannot be opened while the device is locked, resulting in stuck playback.
Fixed a bug that would prevent playback from resuming correctly after foobar2000 was suspended by the operating system.

TuneFUSION reliability improvements.
Improved appearance on iOS 13.

Fixed wrong indexing of discnumber tags padded with zeros - you might need to remove disable/enable affected folders for this to take full effect
Fixed bugs with "show non-audio files in folders"
Music folder now visible in iOS Files app.

Fixed equalizer sliders not working on old iOS versions.
Made equalizer show numeric values of each slider when dragging.
Fixed bugs related to renaming folders.
Fixed a bug causing poor performance when browsing HTTP folders.

Lockscreen seekbar now functional.
Various internal fixes.

Improved handling of files with missing title tags
Crashbug fixes
FTP client & server compatibility fixes
Restored prev/next track controls on lockscreen
Stability improvements

Fixed unnecessary full rescans of TuneFUSION music folder on every startup.
Fixed some WMA files being falsely reported as DRM-protected.
Added cover art display for WMA.

Greatly improved TuneFUSION reliability.
New TuneFUSION status and pairing pages.
Fixed visual glitches on devices with notches.
iOS 9 or newer is now required.

New first run experience with prompts for music location and music transfer options.
TuneFUSION usability improvements.
Fixed crash on dropped FTP connection.

Fixed wrong indexing of discnumber tags padded with zeros - you might need to remove disable/enable affected folders for this to take full effect
Fixed bugs with "show non-audio files in folders"
Music folder now visible in iOS Files app.
Fixed a bug that would prevent playback from resuming correctly after foobar2000 was suspended by the operating system.

TuneFUSION reliability improvements.
Improved appearance on iOS 13.

Fixed iOS 13 lock screen integration bugs.
Worked around AirDrop creating encrypted files that cannot be opened while the device is locked, resulting in stuck playback.
Crash bug fix

Introduced cuesheet playback support, both external and internal.
WebP cover art is now supported, as both embedded and external (folder.webp)
Reworked advanced settings, now viewing options in groups
Added smooth playback mode - fade on pause/se

General bug fixes.
Added support for xHE-AAC format using system codecs on latest iOS.
